alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Macon; Montgomery; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 8:04AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Elmore, central Macon, south central Tallapoosa and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 845 AM CDT... At 804 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emerald Mountain, or 7 miles southeast of Wetumpka, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Montgomery, Tuskegee, Wetumpka, Tallassee, Notasulga, Milstead, Shorter, Franklin, Auburn University In Montgomery, Reeves Airport, Lake Tuskegee, Emerald Mountain, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Liverpool, Liberty City, Tallapoosa City, Eastdale Mall, Mount Meigs and Tysonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
